sentences.sContent: It’s difficult to see how more savings can be made.
sentences.sCn: 想要进一步节约看来是很难了。

sentences.sContent: He’s finding it difficult to get a job.
...Viewing the past in high definition can make it very difficult to get over pain and regret...
...and the lack of knowledge is difficult if not impossible to compen...
...Students who put off their work until the last moment often find the exams more difficult than they actually are...
...it may be difficult to completely eliminate bias...
...is the third key factor--and a difficult one to preserve...
...The most difficult step in programming values will be deciding exactly what we believe in moral...
...It is really difficult to tell if assisted living is better than a nursing home...
...So many people who visit Britain say it's difficult to make friends with British people...

synos.tran: 困难的；不随和的；执拗的

phrases.pCn: 问题地区；特殊土地区；非凡土地区

trans.tranOther: hard to do, understand, or deal with
